weather.question: I fall from the sky, and help flowers grow. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am wet.
☔️ You need an umbrella when I fall.
🌱 Plants love me!

weather.question: I am big and bright and warm. I come out during the day. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I shine.
😎 You need sunglasses when I am out.
🔥 I can make you hot!

weather.question: I am white and cold, and fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of ice.
🧤 You wear mittens when I am around.
☃️ You can make a snowman with me!

weather.question: I make the trees dance. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can be gentle or strong.
🪁 You can fly a kite with me.
🌬️ I can blow your hat off!

weather.question: I am gray and full of water, and sometimes I cry. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I float in the sky.
⛈️ I can make thunder.
🌧️ Rain comes from me!

weather.question: Sometimes after it rains, you can see me, with many colors in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have a lot of colors.
✨I am shaped like an arc.
☀️ You can see me when the sun is behind you and it’s raining in front!

weather.question: I am a loud noise in the sky that comes after lightning. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡️ I follow a flash of light.
👂 You can hear me from far away.
⛈️ I am a part of a thunderstorm

weather.question: I am a flash of light in the sky during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I am very bright!
⛈️ You see me before you hear thunder.
⚡️ I can be dangerous.

weather.question: When it is very cold, water can turn into me. I am slippery!

hints.text: 🧊 I am frozen water
⛸️ People can skate on me
🥶 I form when the temperature is below freezing

weather.question: I am a big storm with strong winds that spins around and around over the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have a swirling shape.
🌊 I form over warm ocean water.
🌪️ My winds can be very, very strong.

food.question: I am yellow and you peel me to eat me. Monkeys like me! What am I?

hints.text: 📏 I am long and curved.
💛 My color is like the sun.
🐒 Monkeys love to eat me.

food.question: I am small, round, and red. I grow on a plant and you can eat me like a snack. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am the color of fire trucks.
🌱 I grow in a garden.
🍅 I am yummy in salad.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐮 I come from a farm animal.
🥛 I am good with cookies.
🦴 I help your bones grow big and strong.

food.question: I am orange and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable.
🐇 Bugs Bunny likes to eat me.
🔶 I am a bright color.

food.question: I am a sweet treat, cold and yummy. You eat me with a spoon. What am I?

hints.text: 🍧 I am often served in a cone.
🍦 I come in many flavors, like chocolate and vanilla.
🥄 You need a spoon to eat me.

food.question: I am long and green, and you can eat me in a salad. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I have a lot of water inside.
🥗 I taste good with salad dressing.
💚 I am the same color as grass.

food.question: I am round and juicy, with a green skin. I am red inside and have black seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I am very big and can be hard to carry.
⚫ I have small black parts you don't always eat.
☀️ I am a popular snack in the summer.

food.question: I am made of bread with yummy fillings inside. You can pack me for lunch. What am I?

hints.text: 🥪 You can add cheese and meat to me.
🍞 I have two slices on the outside.
🎒 I am easy to take to school.

food.question: I grow underground and can be mashed, baked, or fried. What am I?

hints.text: 🥔 I am brown or red on the outside and white or yellow inside.
🍟 You can make french fries with me!
🌿 I grow hidden under the soil.

food.question: I am made from apples and baked in the oven. I have a flaky crust and a sweet filling. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 My main ingredient grows on trees.
🥧 People eat me for dessert, sometimes with ice cream.
🔥 I am baked to make me crispy and tasty.
